title: Ape to Ape at RAW Science film festival!
content: We proudly announce that our short documentary Ape to Ape has won the Grand Jury Prize of the Raw Science Film Festival in New York City!
instagramUrl: We proudly announce that our short documentary Ape to Ape has won the Grand Jury Prize of the Raw Science Film Festival in New York City!

title: New project wrapped
content: Just wrapped up the sound design for an exciting new thriller. Can't wait to share more!

title: Studio session
content: Recording session in the studio today. Creating unique Foley sounds for an upcoming film project.
